techmeme.title: Avail, a modular blockchain project building "rollup-centric infrastructure", raised a $43M Series A, after raising a $27M seed in February 2024 (Yogita Khatri/The Block)
Washington DC's AG says Michael Saylor and his company MicroStrategy will pay $40M to settle a tax suit, calling it "the largest income tax recovery" ever in DC (Kelly Phillips Erb/Forbes)
GetWhy, a market research AI company that was founded in 2011 as UserTribe and extracts insights from video interviews, raised a $34.5M Series A (Paul Sawers/TechCrunch)
Source: Canadian AI startup Cohere has raised $450M from Nvidia, Salesforce, Cisco, and others and is looking to raise more in the same round at a $5B valuation (Krystal Hu/Reuters)
Meta rolls out an update to "significantly" reduce the Quest 3's passthrough distortion and warping, an experimental wrist-mounted menu button option, and more (David Heaney/UploadVR)
